desc: As a Front-end Developer and Tech Lead at one of Manabi Group's partner companies, Baymetrics, I lead a team of highly skilled professionals. Together with the Manabi team, our focus is on driving innovation and technical excellence, contributing to the ongoing success of the projects we develop.

Working in partnership with SERINEWS provides me with a unique experience where I can apply my technical knowledge and front-end development skills to meet the specific needs of each client. I have the autonomy to make decisions and manage projects, ensuring that results are delivered with excellence.

Working at Agência 4Tuna has been a rewarding experience, where I can apply my passion for the mobile world and creativity to each project. The autonomy I have to work collaboratively with the team and clients allows us to deliver personalized and innovative solutions, driving the success of our clients.
